column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////For my meal I got the Prime Bone In Dry Aged Ribeye. This thing was AMAZING! SO MUCH FLAVOR! I think it was dry aged about 32 days and wet aged about 28.. It was sooo good! The outside had this crust to it that tasted amazing
column2: and the inside melted in my mouth like butter. The best steak I've ever had. I highly highly recommend this one.
